noun.description: Acceptance of the truth or existence of something.
examples: there was no acknowledgment of the family's trauma

noun.description: The action of expressing or displaying gratitude or appreciation for something.
examples: he received an award in acknowledgment of his work

noun.description: The action of showing that one has noticed someone or something.
examples: he touched his hat in acknowledgment of the salute

noun.description: A letter confirming receipt of something.
examples: I received an acknowledgment of my application

noun.description: An author's or publisher's statement of indebtedness to others, typically one printed at the beginning of a book.
